core.simulation_manager¶

Architecture: iterate of scenarios, iterate on parameters of scenarios, iterate on same parameters. For last level, can be hard reboot simulation every N simulations or not (batches). Within batches, can be parallelised

or not.

Functions

build_command(args)

create_paras_file_from_dict(paras_dict, ...)
